itemDescription: British film production designer, art director and set decorator

wikipedia_page.main: Robert W. Laing is a British production designer, art director and set decorator. He won an Academy Award and was nominated for another in the category Best Art Direction.

link_mentions.page: Academy Award for Best Production Design
response: | John Box, Gil Parrondo and Robert W. Laing

*Robert W. Laing, British film art director
